subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The sun is just beginning to rise on the Mets' fortunes. This season provided a long-awaited opportunity for Mets fans to roar, and Carlos Beltrán was a big part of it.
snippet: The sun is just beginning to rise on the Mets' fortunes. This season provided a long-awaited opportunity for Mets fans to roar, and Carlos Beltrán was a big part of it.
